Index

common.js

This file contains the classes for Map and Foursquare, handling the API and functionality to plot maps and retrieve tips from Foursquare.
Author:
  • Gui Ambros gui@wrgms.com
Source:
  • src/js/common.js, line 1

model.js

This file contains the Model, reading from the json data file. The original array is stored in app.data. The status of the asynchronous getJSON operation is stored in app.model_status, and a Promise is returned.
Author:
  • Gui Ambros gui@wrgms.com
Source:
  • src/js/model.js, line 1

views.js

This file contains the viewModel and the logic to build and update the user interface according to user's input, following the classic MVVM approach. It uses Knockout.js to interface with the view in HTML.
Version:
  • 0.3
Author:
  • Gui Ambros gui@wrgms.com
Source:
  • src/js/views.js, line 1
